misuses.description: The key size is too small, which can be easily cracked by a determined attacker.
misuses.recommendation: Use a larger key size, such as 2048 or 4096, to improve the encryption strength.

misuses.misuse: CWE-757: Selection of Less-Secure Algorithm During Negotiation
misuses.description: The RSA algorithm is not considered secure anymore, it is recommended to use a more secure algorithm such as AES or ECC.
misuses.recommendation: Use a more secure algorithm such as AES or ECC to improve the security of the encryption.
